experience.description: Developed an AI powered drug test result logging system for clinics and patients that automatically analyzes and interprets test results using ML to streamline the reporting process.

Developed 'Remembering Their Faces' Project which aims to provide a collection of histories of the Canadian Armed Forces for Family, Historians and Researchers to connect upon. The platform uses AI ethically to automatically detect related faces and entities and create networks to learn from.
Developed a Manufacturing Execution system using ASP.NET and Angular that is used to control machines in factories around the world.
Developed an application that integrates with Arduino based microcontrollers to visualize and record various sensor data in real-time.
Conducted Study sessions to help first semester students in the Programming Fundamentals (Python) course. Boosted the average attendee grade by 18%.

projects.name: Mohawk Chatbot
projects.description: AI powered chatbot for the Mohawk College's PASS program using OpenAI's API

projects.name: Lab Controller
projects.description: Tkinter-based GUI controlling Arduino microcontroller and fetching sensor in real time using multi-threading
